name: Cultural Adaptability
desc: During your adventures, you've honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you. You gain the Adopted Ancestry general feat, and you also gain one 1st-level ancestry feat from the ancestry you chose for the Adopted Ancestry feat.
shortdesc: During your adventures, you've honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you.
